revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox Key Item |name = Holo Caster |image = [[File:Holo caster Highres.png]] |caption = The ''Holo Caster''. |use = A device that allows users to see and track [[Achievements]]. |obtain = Capture 110 or more different Pokémon }}
===Description=== <!--T:2--> A device that allows users to see and track [[Achievements]]. Completing Achievements gives useful bonuses.
===Acquisition=== <!--T:3--> Capture 110 different Pokémon. When this is complete, the Holo Caster will be granted by Professor Oak and the Achievement modal will be unlocked on the game interface.
===Effects=== <!--T:4--> You will now have the Achievement Modal to easily open the Achievements menu and track your progress of an achievement.
<!--T:5--> {{Key Items}} [[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]] </translate>
